step_original: Derogation from import prohibition by virtue of Article 16i (1) of Council Regulation (EU) 2017/1509
step_description: Import will be prohibited unless specific derogations are in place
step_howto_description: HMRC / Border Force may authorise the import, purchase or transfer of textiles, provided that the advance approval of the Sanctions Committee has been sought and agreed on a case-by-case basis.
